item.title: Version 1.9.1
item.description:
A hotfix was added that fixes a performance regression

Changes

  • Further optimizations to frame blocking behaviour
  • Patching option has been removed from the tray icon to avoid user confusion
    • Still available by manually copying files if you know what you're doing

Bug fixes

  • Revive: Fixed Asgard's Wrath loading screen blinking on/off (#1347)
